'''Tunner's Cough Syrup''' is a quest item from the daily [[commission]] [[Things a Father Can Do]]. It is made from [[Sweet Flower]]s.

[[Jilliana]] from the [[Favonius Cathedral]] is trained in preparing the syrup.
